Title: Ancient Power
Description:
Hozen skulls are prized tokens among my village.

We use them to perform ceremonial rites, and the older the skull, the more potent its magic.

Luckily for us, the hozen are careless, filthy beasts. They leave the skulls of their dead scattered among their huts and campfires.

Collect these skulls for me, and I will reward you handsomely.
CompletionText: The skulls are precious to my tribe. How many have you collected?
RewardText:
It is good to see that you are so resourceful, $n. It is a trait admired by my people.

The fine specimens you have brought me will produce powerful magic.
